channel.title: Cross-Media Electronic Reporting Rule
channel.description: Updated Cross-Media Electronic Reporting Rule content from the US Environmental Protection Agency

item.title: EPA Compliance Monitoring Data Portal CROMERR Application Cover Sheet
item.description:
Template cover sheet to provide information required for CROMERR application review and approval for EPA Office of Water's Compliance Monitoring Data Portal (CMDP).

  • EPA Compliance Monitoring Data Portal CROMERR Application Cover Sheet (PDF)(1 pg, 15 K, July 2016)
item.dc:creator: jlavash

item.description:
Template cover sheet to provide information required for NPDES Electronic Reporting Tool (NeT) CROMERR application review and approval.

  • EPA NPDES Electronic Reporting Tool (NeT) CROMERR Application Cover Sheet (PDF)(2 pp, 75 K, May 2016)
item.dc:creator: jlavash

item.title: CROMERR Application Cover Sheet
item.description:
Template cover sheet to provide information required for CROMERR application review and approval.

item.title: CROMERR Legal Certification Guide for State Attorney General or Local Government or Tribe Certifying Official Statement
item.description:
This document provides guidance, templates and examples that will help when preparing official statements from an attorney general or a certifying official from a local government or tribe.

  • CROMERR Legal Certification Guide for State Attorney General or Local Government or Tribe Certifying Official Statement (PDF)(15 pp, 738 K, 08/22/2016)
item.dc:creator: jlavash

item.title: CROMERR Electronic Signature Agreement Guide
item.description:
CROMERR requires that users sign an electronic signature agreement, or ESA, normally as part of the registration process. 

This document provides an example of electronic signature agreement language that may be used, in part, to satisfy the electronic signature agreement or subscriber agreement requirement of 40 C.F.R. § 3.2000(b)(5)(v). Applicants need to include a copy of the electronic signature agreement in their CROMERR application.

  • CROMERR Electronic Signature Agreement Guide (PDF)(11 pp, 203 K, January 2016)
item.dc:creator: jlavash

item.title: CROMERR Compliance for the Publicly Owned Treatment Works Pretreatment Program
item.description:
Publicly Owned Treatment Works (POTW) NPDES Pretreament e-Reporting

A memorandum to Pretreatment Authorities who are Cross‐Media Electronic Reporting Rule (CROMERR) applicants about their obligation to follow both National Pretreatment Program requirements and CROMERR procedures when applying for, approving and incorporating CROMERR practices into an approved POTW pretreatment program.

  • CROMERR Compliance for POTW Pretreatment Program (PDF)(5 pp, 141 K, July 2015)
item.dc:creator: jlavash

item.title: CROMERR Step-by-Step Guide to Create and Submit a Successful Application
item.description:
Guidance for preparing and submitting a successful CROMERR application to incorporate electronic reporting as well as an overview of the CROMERR application review process.

  • CROMERR Step by Step Guide to Create and Submit a Successful Application (PDF)(20 pp, 380 K, July 2015)
item.dc:creator: jlavash
